All Classes

Class Description
Archers
Class Archers is an instance of archer regiment
Armies
Class Armies serves every need in terms of creating and managing army.
ArmiesEnum  
ArmiesStatusEnum  
ArmyBuild
Class ArmyBuild and it's instances calls various methods, that essentially create every part of an "army".
Battle  
Carthaginian
Class Carthaginian is a reference to carthaginian faction
Cavalry
Class Cavalry is an instance of cavalry regiment
Celtic
Class Celtic is a reference to celtic faction
Commander
Class Commander creates instances of commanders of armies, which greatly influence outcome of simulation
Composition
Class Composition creates composition for both armies, either randomly or with user's input
Controller  
DefaultRandomFactors
Interface DefaultRandomFactors provides some default methods to superclass Unit
Faction
Class Faction allows user or program choose faction for armies
FactionEnum  
FileControl
Class FileControl handles saving the results of the simulation to a file
Game  
Greek
Class Greek is a reference to greek faction
HeavyInfantry
Class HeavyInfantry is an instance of heavy infantry regiment
LightInfantry
Class LightInfatry is an instance of light infantry regiment
Location
Class Location control and sets location property
LocationEnum  
MainProgram
Class MainProgram contains main method and other methods used for acquisition of user's input, upon which certain scenario of program will run.
MyRectangleUnit  
MyThread  
Output  
Pikemen
Class Pikemen is an instance of pikemen regiment
RandomFactors
Interface RandomFactors implements it's methods to classes Archers and Cavalry
Result
Class Result decide result of the simulation and print it in console
Roman
Class Roman is a reference to Roman faction
Units
Class Units is a superclass for more specific unit types.
UnitsEnum  
UnitsStatusEnum  
Weather
Class Weather control and sets weather property
WeatherEnum
